name: Pollymorf
overview: Simplified version of the Licenseware game Paradox from the same author. Pollymorph is a single-player colour-matching puzzle game. In this game the player controls a small ball that can be used move other balls around. When two same-coloured balls meet they disappear and the game objective is to clear the game area by pushing balls of the same colour together. The number of balls and the complexity of the game area increases as the player progresses through the game.
